content: I am a full stack web developer residing on the Space Coast of Florida, available for hire as a web developer or software engineer in the Space Coast and Orlando areas.

Since beginning my career transition in September 2019, I have learned various skills critical for modern day web development such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also learned and practiced concepts such as Responsive Web design, Accessibility, User Interface Libraries and Frameworks, Front End Architectures, Database Management, Database Schema Design, and Backend Web Development. I have applied these skills and concepts to my projects.

Before this career transition, my background had always been in customer service and business development. I had gained valuable skills such as communication, problem solving, and adaptability. These skills have translated very well into the world of tech, not only in creating applications, but also collaboration with others.
My current goal is to acquire a position as a software developer. Below are skills I have mastered, and am continuing to improve upon further.
